tests.name: Basic
snr:
REGISTER u p
RESULT REGISTER 1
LOGIN u p
RESULT LOGIN 1
CREATE c
RESULT CREATE c 1
JOIN c
RESULT JOIN c 1
SAY c m
RESULT SAY c 1
RECV u c m
CHANNELS
RESULT CHANNELS c

tests.name: CreateWithoutLogin
snr:
CREATE c
RESULT CREATE c 1
CHANNELS
RESULT CHANNELS c

tests.name: WrongPassword
snr:
REGISTER username password
RESULT REGISTER 1
LOGIN username passwordn't
RESULT LOGIN 0

tests.name: ChannelAlreadyExists
snr:
CREATE channel
RESULT CREATE channel 1
CREATE channel
RESULT CREATE channel 0

tests.name: JoinNotLoggedIn
snr:
CREATE channel
RESULT CREATE channel 1
JOIN channel
RESULT JOIN channel 0

tests.name: JoinNoSuchChannel
snr:
REGISTER username password
RESULT REGISTER 1
LOGIN username password
RESULT LOGIN 1
JOIN channel
RESULT JOIN channel 0

tests.name: JoinChannelAlreadyMember
snr:
REGISTER username password
RESULT REGISTER 1
LOGIN username password
RESULT LOGIN 1
CREATE channel
RESULT CREATE channel 1
JOIN channel
RESULT JOIN channel 1
JOIN channel
RESULT JOIN channel 0

tests.name: SayNotLoggedIn
snr:
CREATE channel
RESULT CREATE channel 1
SAY channel Here is the message.
RESULT SAY channel 0

tests.name: SayNoSuchChannel
snr:
REGISTER username password
RESULT REGISTER 1
LOGIN username password
RESULT LOGIN 1
SAY channel Here is the message.
RESULT SAY channel 0

tests.name: SayNotChannelMember
snr:
REGISTER username password
RESULT REGISTER 1
LOGIN username password
RESULT LOGIN 1
CREATE channel
RESULT CREATE channel 1
SAY channel Here is the message.
RESULT SAY channel 0
